review: Love it! Fast for how small it is.
author: James Gangel

review: Works awesome and love the asap feature. Searching for apps could be a little better and would like to have nbc sports app but overall love the stick!!
author: Tyler Kowal

review: This was one of the best thing,I ever bought great product
author: janine henson

review: Great addition to my tv viewing
author: Brenda

review: I have smart tech on a couple of blue ray players so I understood the concept of the fire stick. After using the fire stick- it is very fast, fluid, and built for streamin( meaning little to no buffering). UI is very simple and fast. Awesome product.
author: km christensen

review: A lot of options on it. Love it.
author: Randall K.

review: Very satisfied with this product.  Was using Chromecast but there was significant lag in videos.  Haven't noticed any of that with the fire stick.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Neat idea - works very very well and really compliments my other media devices.
author: JDM
